Acoustic SOP Preface 0.1 Using this book

Acoustic SOP Alexander G. MacPhail 2022-12-09 Preface 0.1 Using this book The goal of this book is to provide a comprehensive, accessible, engaging and referenceable set of documentation in order to satisfy the scope of the SOP You can jump to different sections of the book using the links. WildTrax specific tools, functions or just general jargon is stylized like tasks or two-stage subsampling. Species are stylized like Ovenbird (OVEN), Wolverine or Tennessee Warbler (TEWA). The four-letter codes follow the most recent taxonomic workbench in WildTrax.
